# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a switch control from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An object containing data used to initialize the switch control.

## Creating a switch

- **init(frame:)**: Creates a switch control.
title: init(coder:)
